description: Colorado Retail and Sales Tax information are summarized monthly at the county level by industry. Retail Sales and Net Tax for the monthly filing period are summarized by county and industry in this report including retail trade totals. Contains fields like agriculture, clothing, food & beverage, etc.

name: DOR January 2013 Retail by County and Industry
